items.title: IDP Market Update: July 2025 Roundup
items.content_html: The intelligent document processing (IDP) market is experiencing explosive growth and significant transformation in July 2025, with projections showing the sector expanding from $10.6 billion in 2025 to an astounding $66.7 billion by 2032, according to Forbes analysis. This remarkable 30% annual growth rate is being driven primarily by generative AI advances, fundamentally reshaping how organizations approach document automation.
